name: Sorting Algorithm (lectvs)
description:
You are a sorting algorithm. Sort.

This game is a little creepy. Play at your own discretion.

Tested with Chrome and Firefox. Please report bugs to https://twitter.com/lectvs 

Controls:

  • Click and drag - Sort
  • ESC - Pause
  • F - Fullscreen

Tools Used:

  • pixi.js 
  • WebAudio API
  • Paint.NET 
  • PyxelEdit 
  • sfxia
  • SFXR
  • FLStudio
